snippet: A museum to Pierre Salinger, John F. Kennedy’s jovial spokesman, is tucked away in the Provençal village where Mr. Salinger spent the last years of his life.
abstract: Le Thor Journal; southeastern French village of Le Thor is home to a bed and breakfast that once belonged to Pierre Salinger, storied and charismatic journalist who became John F Kennedy's press secretary; building hosts exhibit memorializing Salinger's dramatic career as a Kennedy courtier.
lead_paragraph: A museum to Pierre Salinger, John F. Kennedy’s jovial spokesman, is tucked away in the Provençal village where Mr. Salinger spent the last years of his life.

headline.seo: Museum in France Honors Kennedy Aide, Salinger
headline.main: Medieval French Village Echoes With the Voice of Kennedy’s Camelot
headline.print_headline: Medieval French Village Echoes With the Voice Of Kennedy’s Camelot
